input.sentences: the race had finally started and i got started running .
it was going to be a long event so i needed to pace myself .
there were tons of other people running .
some people were injured and had to have someone help them .
at the end of the race there was a live band playing .
output.sentences: Al had been training for weeks for the race and he started running once the starter pistol signalled the begining, very easily.
He knew the event was a long one, that would take him through many streets, and he planned to pace himself.
It seemed to him that there were absolutely tons of people on every side of him, running.
Gradually, as people got injured, or tired, the ranks thinned out considerably.
Al knew the folks at home were seeing the race playing live and did his best.
